projects.briefDescription: HopePulse is a platform that connects blood donors and recipients, offering a seamless experience for registration, requests, and management, with secure user authentication and real-time alerts.
challengesFaced: Integrating Firebase authentication and real-time database functionalities.
Setting up Stripe payment gateway for donation management.
Ensuring secure image hosting and user data encryption.
Building an efficient donor search functionality.
potentialImprovements: Integrate more payment gateways for easy donations.
Introduce a feature for live updates on blood availability.
Add more user-friendly features for faster donor-recipient matching.
Enhance admin functionalities with detailed analytics.

projects.briefDescription: Study Buddy is a web app for teachers and students to create, track, and grade assignments with ease, offering collaboration tools and distinct dashboards for each user role.
challengesFaced: Ensuring smooth real-time updates for assignment submission tracking.
Managing different user roles and ensuring secure access.
Handling multiple assignment submissions with Firebase.
potentialImprovements: Introduce more advanced grading criteria and analytics.
Add real-time notifications for students and teachers.
Enable support for file uploads in assignments.
Create a feature for peer evaluations.

projects.briefDescription: Raise Together is a crowdfunding platform that connects creators with supporters, offering real-time updates and engaging campaign pages for a smooth fundraising experience.
challengesFaced: Real-time updates on campaign progress and donor contributions.
Managing dynamic campaign creation and deletion.
Ensuring secure Firebase authentication and data handling.
Creating visually appealing and engaging campaign pages.
potentialImprovements: Introduce advanced campaign analytics and reporting.
Add social media sharing options to boost campaign visibility.
Integrate more payment gateways for diverse donor options.
Enhance accessibility features for users with disabilities.
